participant_1.name: Jake
participant_1.personality: Adventurous and determined, Jake loves skateboarding and pushing his limits, even with a broken arm.
participant_1.background: i have a broken arm. my favourite skater is rob dryden. i am always wearing a hat. my friends are all skateboarders.

participant_2.name: Emily
participant_2.personality: Creative and rebellious, Emily expresses herself through her love for gaming and colorful hair.
participant_2.background: i'm a 12 year old girl. i hate school. i love to play pobox. i have blue eyes and red hair that comes to my waist.
